Topic.Title: Is Text adventure or Gamebook better for a linear story?

Posts.EditableText:
I want to make a story that is more linear, where you just press a link to go to the next page and so on, with background music and images. I tried doing a gamebook but when I was looking for advice on coding (which I know nothing about, most of my knowledge of it comes from copy and pasting examples), it said that gamebooks aren't very good and it's better to make it a text adventure. So I tried that but I just can't get the hang of it, the linking between pages seems too complex and I can't find a way to only display "left" or "right" to go to "next page" and "previous page".

So what's the best thing for me to do? Or should I use a different program altogether?
